price: Na siku atakapo waita na akasema: Wako wapi mlio kuwa mkidai kuwa ni washirika wangu?
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Kumbuka siku watapo simama hawa mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu kwa ajili ya kuhisabiwa, naye Subhanahu akawaita kwa kuwatahayarisha: Wako wapi hao miungu mlio dai kuwa ni washirika wangu, wapate kukuteteeni na kukuombeeni?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu ayna shurakāiya alladhīna kuntum tazʿumūna
